participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Creative and caring, Sophie loves to capture moments through her photography.
participant_1.background: i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i'm fluent in english spanish and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my favorite colors are red and silver. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Practical and nurturing, James has a passion for building and helping others.
participant_2.background: my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. i'm a construction worker.

content.text: I am a teacher, i speak french and english.
I am a teacher, so i am not a big fan of that.
I do not. I want to be a vet.
